items.title: Launching Your Fine Art Career Bootcamp
items.headline: An accelerated 3-part course to help you start, restart or jumpstart your fine art career today!
objectives_summary: You will have the information and resources you need to start, restart or jumpstart your fine art career immediately.
Part 1 focuses on creating a powerful foundation for success including  goal setting, networking, time management and creating effective support materials.
Part 2 discusses the many different types of exhibition opportunities and how to pursue them with a bonus lecture on gallery etiquette.
